mapper.select: select count(orderDetailNo) as count, O.orderNo, memNo, O.productTotalPrice, O.deliveryCharge, O.receiverName, D.productName, O.receiverPostcode, O.receiverAddress, O.receiverAddressDetail, O.receiverPhone, O.receiverRequest, O.paymentType, O.createdAt from `order` as O inner join order_detail as D on O.orderNo = D.orderNo where memNo = #{memNo} group by orderNo order by createdAt desc

select orderNo, memNo, productTotalPrice, deliveryCharge, receiverName, receiverPostcode, receiverAddress, receiverAddressDetail, receiverPhone, receiverRequest, paymentType, createdAt from `order` where orderNo = #{orderNo} and memNo = #{memNo}
mapper.insert: insert into `order`(memNo, productTotalPrice, deliveryCharge, receiverName, receiverPostcode, receiverAddress, receiverAddressDetail, receiverPhone, receiverRequest, paymentType) values (#{memNo}, #{productTotalPrice}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPostcode}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverAddressDetail}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverRequest}, #{paymentType});
